data.event: Catholic fathers of the organization Missionary Oblates of Mary Immaculate founded the Andara Mission in 1913.
Possibilities for this were examined already in 1903 and 1907, and in January 1908 fathers Franz Krist and Franz Lauer together with lay brother Georg Kurz founded the mission.

event.title: January 1908 fathers Franz Krist and Franz Lauer together with lay

data.event: Possibilities for this were examined already in 1903 and 1907, and in January 1908 fathers Franz Krist and Franz Lauer together with lay brother Georg Kurz founded the mission.

event.title: left back for Grootfontein after a few weeks

data.event: Father Krist left back for Grootfontein after a few weeks, but he died along the way.
King Libebe soon became reconciled with the missionaries, and the German fathers re-established Andara in 1913.
